s0001: Cao Mo was a man of Lu, served Lu Zhuang Gong with bravery and strength.
s0003: Cao Mo as Lu general, battled Qi, three times defeated retreated.
s0004: Lu Zhuang Gong feared, thus offered Sui yi land to make peace.
s0006: Qi Huan Gong permitted meet with Lu at Ke to ally.
s0007: Huan Gong with Zhuang Gong having allied on altar, Cao Mo grasped dagger hostage Qi Huan Gong. Huan Gong attendants none dared move, asked: 'You will what desire?'
s0008: Cao Mo said: 'Qi strong Lu weak, great state invade Lu also extreme.
s0009: Now Lu city broken then presses Qi border, lord consider it.'
s0010: Huan Gong thus permitted completely return Lu invaded land.
s0011: Already spoken, Cao Mo threw his dagger, descended altar, north faced took ministers' position, complexion unchanged, words as before.
s0012: Huan Gong angered, wished break agreement.
s0014: Greed small benefit self-pleasure, abandon trust among feudal lords, lose world support, better give him.'
s0015: Thus Huan Gong then cut Qi invaded land, Cao Mo three battles lost land completely restored to Lu.
s0016: After hundred sixty seven years then Wu had Zhuan Zhu affair.
s0017: Zhuan Zhu was Wu Tang yi person.
s0018: Wu Zixu fled Chu went to Wu, knew Zhuan Zhu ability.
s0019: Wu Zixu having seen Wu King Liao, persuaded attacking Chu benefit.
s0020: Wu prince Guang said: 'That Wu Yuan father brothers all died in Chu yet Yuan speaks attack Chu, wishes self avenge private enmity, not can for Wu.'
s0022: Wu Zixu knew Prince Guang desired kill Wu King Liao, thus said: 'That Guang will have inner ambition, cannot persuade with outer affairs.'
s0023: Thus advanced Zhuan Zhu to Prince Guang.
s0024: Guang father called Wu King Zhu Fan.
s0025: Zhu Fan younger brothers three: next called Yu Ji, next called Yi Mei, next called Ji Zi Zha.
s0026: Zhu Fan knew Ji Zi Zha worthy not established crown prince, by order passed three younger brothers, wished finally give state to Ji Zi Zha.
s0027: Zhu Fan having died, passed Yu Ji.
s0028: Yu Ji died, passed Yi Mei.
s0029: Yi Mei died, should pass Ji Zi Zha;
s0030: Ji Zi Zha fled would not establish, Wu people thus established Yi Mei son Liao as king.
s0031: Prince Guang said: 'If by brothers order, Ji Zi should establish;
s0032: Must by son, then Guang true proper heir, should establish.'
s0033: Thus often secretly nurtured plot ministers to seek establishment.
s0034: Guang having obtained Zhuan Zhu, well treated as guest.
s0035: Nine years then Chu Ping Wang died.
s0036: Spring, Wu King Liao wished take Chu mourning, made his two younger brothers Prince Gai Yu, Zhu Yong lead troops surround Chu Qian;
s0037: Sent Yanling Ji Zi to Jin, to observe feudal lords changes.
s0038: Chu sent troops cut Wu generals Gai Yu, Zhu Yong road, Wu troops could not return.
s0039: Thus Prince Guang told Zhuan Zhu: 'This time cannot lose, not seek what obtain!
s0040: Moreover Guang true king heir, should establish, Ji Zi though come, not abolish me.'
s0041: Zhuan Zhu said: 'King Liao can kill.
s0042: Mother old son weak, two younger brothers lead troops attack Chu, Chu cut their rear.
s0043: Now Wu externally distressed by Chu, internally empty without backbone ministers, is cannot do anything to me.'
s0044: Prince Guang bowed head: 'Guang body, your body.'
s0046: Fourth month bing zi, Guang hid armored soldiers in cave chamber, prepared wine invited King Liao.
s0047: King Liao made troops array from palace to Guang home, doorways stairs left right, all King Liao relatives.
s0048: Flanking standing attendants, all held long spears.
s0049: Wine already flowing, Prince Guang feigned foot illness, entered cave chamber, made Zhuan Zhu place dagger in fish roast belly advanced it.
s0050: Having reached king before, Zhuan Zhu split fish, thus with dagger stabbed King Liao, King Liao immediately died.
s0051: Attendants also killed Zhuan Zhu, king people chaotic.
